info.title: Products
info.description: Through this reference you can consult, update, delete or insert products.

count_unlimited.description: Returns the total number of records

get.description:
Retrieves information for all products. - Request return limit is 100 at a time, for older records use the filter options. - Header-param: count_unlimited (Returns the total number of records). **Filters** If necessary it is possible to send filters, they are informed directly in the request URL as GET. *Example Limit* - {slug-landingpage}/products?limit=7

*Example Pagination* - {slug-landingpage}/products?page=2&per_page=100

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: API accepts only JSON type data
